channel.title: Devo 7.7 problem
channel.description: well, my problem is that on devo 7.7 i attack an npc, it attacks back but it never hits me it always hits 0's. can any1 help me here? i tryied playing with npchandler and stuff like that but it didnt work.

item.title: Devo 7.7 problem
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

go in the npc.cfg and find the monster id and then there are like 0s and stuff to the left, well change those to wat u want him to hit with the attacks he has.

Read full topic
